attributes.action: Change the law to be vaccinated in the NHS or loose your job
attributes.additional_details: To keep professionals within the NHS working in health care and have the right the autonomy and choice over their own body, not forced to make a choice on weather they want to be vaccinated or loose their job that they have spent years gaining education and experience doing.
attributes.background: Over rule the law set that persons working in healthcare or the NHS must be vaccinated against their will or loose their jobs or education.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not make COVID vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872

Do not make covid-19 or flu vaccine a condition of deployment for NHS workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598996
